answers.answer: Hi and thanks for using the forum.Just because your partner is diabetic does not mean your child will be as well.  Your child inherits genes from both you and your husband and the genetic link for type 1 diabetes is still not fully understood.  For example, there are cases with identical twins where one twin develops type 1 diabetes but the other does not.  So don't be too concerned at this point.  I hope this helps.  Good luck and congratulations!Bridget
